justification: The candidate lacks direct experience in B2B sales, which is crucial for the relevant experience score.
No evidence of strategic thinking applicable to business development roles.
No indication of specific knowledge or experience in the IT and manufacturing sectors, which is required.
Lacks direct proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, which is a minimum requirement.

requirements.criteria: Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries

input.job_description:
### Join Apex Global Solutions as a Business Development Manager  

Apex Global Solutions is seeking a dedicated Business Development Manager to bolster our B2B sales efforts and enhance our market presence. This role requires a strategic thinker with the ability to forge and maintain robust client relationships, lead market analysis, and drive revenue growth through innovative sales strategies.

#### Key Responsibilities  
- Develop and implement strategic business development plans to meet organizational goals.
- Identify and qualify new business opportunities and partnerships.
- Lead market research to determine new market segments and customer needs.
- Foster long-term relationships with clients through successful engagement and collaboration.
- Track and report on key business metrics, providing insights and data-driven recommendations to executive leadership.
- Collaborate with internal teams to ensure alignment and excellence in service delivery.

#### Required Skills  
- Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities.
- Proven experience in B2B sales and marketing, particularly in IT and manufacturing sectors.
- Proficient in market research and data analysis.
- Strong leadership and project management capabilities.

#### Benefits  
- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
- Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement.
- Health and wellness benefits package.
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment.

Join us to spearhead business growth initiatives that deliver significant value and drive our mission forward.
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
input.resume:
ABDULLAH JAWAID 
Gulshan e Iqbal, block 2, Karachi, 75300 | +92 334 3664340 | abdullahjawaid@hotmail.com  
Summary Statement 
 Initiative-taking Electrical Engineer with 10+ years of experience excelling in electrical design, project 
management, and Installation, Testing & Commissioning. Proven record in team engagement, 
equipment procurement, and project execution. Effective communicator with expertise in handling 
contractors, vendors, and clients. Proficient in progress reporting and adept at ensuring project success 
through meticulous diligence and efficient procedures. 
Project Based Experience  
 Testing & Pre-Commissioning Lead  | E-House for DS03 Electrical Power Upgrade at CPS4  for 
Rumaila Operating Organization (ROO) – Iraq | May-Jul 2024  
 Achievements:  
 Thoroughly conducted internal testing of ABB ZS1 6.6kV Switchboard (16 panels), including 
motor and transformer feeders, EATON 400V switchboard, Chloride DC UPS 60A, F&G 
system, and auxiliary systems. 
 Successfully led the integrated Factory Acceptance Test (iFAT) with the customer for the entire 
E-house, receiving appreciation for its successful completion. 
 
 Project Lead  | LV Switchboard & Soft Starter Panels for AVINA Clean Hydrogen Inc. – USA | 
Apr-Present 2024  
 Achievements:  
 Leading the sourcing and design validation of ABB ReliaGear Switchboard and standalone 
PSTX series soft starters. 
 Ensuring technical compliance and meeting tight deadlines by offering fast delivery products. 
 
 Commissioning Lead  | E-house Commissioning Services at Basrah Natural Gas Liquefaction Plant 
(BNGL), Basrah Gas Company (BGC) – Iraq | Mar-Apr 2023 & Jan-Apr 2024  
 Achievements:  
 Managed multiple vendors and clients from technical, commercial and administrative aspects to 
execute Site Acceptance Tests, pre-commissioning, and commissioning of 4 E-houses.  
 Provided technical support for first solo/load runs of the medium and low voltage motors and 
troubleshooting throughout the project execution. 
 Enhanced my role by conducting mechanical inspections, interlock checks, and making logic 
modifications to the switchgear, all to accommodate customer budget constraints. 
 
 Installation Supervisor  | Casting of Cast Resin Sandwich Bus ducts – 4000 A –  KM500 Gas 
Treatment Plant (Pearl Petroleum) – Kurdistan Region of Iraq | Jan 2024  
 Achievements:  
 Effectively supervised the casting of Cast Resin Sandwich Bus ducts rated at 4000 A.  
 Displayed my adaptability by taking on challenges and self-training to meet and exceed 
customer requirements. 2  
 Commissioning Lead  | ABB E-house Commissioning Services at Basrah Natural Gas Liquefaction 
Plant (BNGL), Basrah Gas Company (BGC) – Iraq  3 Nos. Substations | May – Dec 2023  
 Achievements:  
 Managed multiple vendors and clients from technical, commercial and administrative aspects to 
execute Site Acceptance Tests, pre-commissioning, and commissioning of 3 ABB E-houses.  
 Provided technical support for site modifications as per customer requirements. 
 
 Electrical Lead  | Frontier Works Organization 10,000 cubic meter / day SWRO Plant, Karachi – 
Karachi Nuclear Power Plant |  Apr 2019 – Jan 2023  
 Achievements:  
 Single handedly managed multiple vendors and clients from technical, commercial, and 
administrative aspects throughout the design, procurement, installation, testing and 
commissioning phases of the project. 
 Eyed for details to follow stringent nuclear facility requirements such as sourcing of scarcely 
available Class 1E category power cables. 
 Used my negotiation skills to close out the procurement within budget and ensured deliveries 
ahead of schedule. 
 
 Electrical Engineer  | 8.2 MW 18V32 HFO Engine (used) with Switchgear System Engineering 
Review, Procurement, Installation & Commissioning – National Refinery Limited (NRL), Karachi | 
2017 – 2018.  
 Achievements:  
 Supported team in the design, procurement and installation commissioning.  
 
 Electrical Engineer  | Implementation of Yokogawa DCS in Lube Refinery – NRL | 2017 – 2018 
 Achievements:  
 Successfully devised conceptual circuit for MCC operation from DCS, approved by Yokogawa 
engineering team and implemented. 
 Enhanced site grounding system to follow Yokogawa requirement. 
 
 Project Lead  | Electrical System Upgrade of 4 MW 12V32 HFO Engine (Wartsila) – NRL | 2016 – 
2018 
 Achievements:  
 Studied existing system and presented to Wartsila team to integrate new system with old system. 
 
 Electrical Engineer  | Replacement of 7.5 MW Steam Turbine, Control System Upgrade, and 
Overhauling of Alternator – NRL | 2015 – 2017.  
 Achievements:  
 Took charge of the project midway to address engineering challenges related to synchronization, 
load sharing, and integrating with the existing system. 
 
 3  Electrical Engineer  | Revamp of Crude Distillation Unit – NRL | 2015 – 2016  
 Achievements:  
 Reviewed FEED documents and ensured project compliance according to the design. 
 
 Trainee – Senior Management  | National Refinery Limited  (NRL) | 2014 – 2015  
 Achievements:  
 Demonstrated active involvement in troubleshooting in different process areas including power 
generation. Was awarded with outstanding appraisal during this period. 
 
 Trainee Engineer  | Installation of Vertical Cement Mills - Lucky Cement Limited  | 2014 
 Achievements:  
 Effectively worked on switchgear protection relay testing and power cables testing. 
Education  
Master of Engineering Management (Industrial Management)  | NED university of engineering and 
technology, Karachi, Pakistan | 2015 – 2016  
Bachelor of Engineering (Electrical)  | NED university of engineering and technology, Karachi, Pakistan 
| 2010 – 2013  
Skills & Abilities  
Certifications  
 Cast Resin Bus duct Installation and Maintenance | Virtual Training by LINKK | Dec 2023 
 Professional Engineer (Electrical Engineer) | ANZSCO Skill Level 1| Engineers Australia | Dec 2022 
 O&M of 3500 Vibration Monitoring & Protection | Bentley Nevada | Lahore 2018 
 Centum VP R6 (Maintenance, Engineering & PRM) | Yokogawa | Singapore 2017 
 Advanced Power System Protection (ETAP) | NED University | Karachi 2013

 Electrical Design Evaluation 
(FEED)  Project Management  Contractors / Vendors 
Managing

Sourcing  Communication Skills 
 Installation, Testing & 
Commissioning  Conducting FAT / SAT  Project Costing and 
budgeting 
 Functional Safety  Preparation of Work 
Instructions and Procedures  Progress Reporting during 
all stages of Project 4  
Executed Tasks  
 Leading Electrical Systems E-house projects including design of Single Line Diagram, design / 
review / selection MV & LV panels, cable sizing and cable routing, selection of transformers, 
selection of UPS, Fire Alarm System, and earthling system. 
 Managing Installation, Testing and Commissioning of E-houses 
 Planning project baselines 
 Performing design reviews/evaluation including power system studies & presenting it to client for 
approval 
 Conducting procurement of project material such as HV/LV components (XLPE Cables, Switchgear, 
Transformers, Power Factor & Reactors, Lighting System, Earthling /Grounding) 
 Managing multiple stakeholders including consultants, joint-venture partners, national & international 
vendors, and contractors to satisfy client’s requirements. 
 Aligning across functions tasks 
 Initiating and leading activity/job planning sessions. 
 Conducting FAT/SAT and Supervising & assisting Installation, Testing & Commissioning of 
Electrical Equipment 
 Managing all incoming & outgoing documentation 
 Monitoring & Controlling project baselines and keeping track of Project Status 
 Conducting project closeout 
Experience

details.executive_summary: Abdullah Jawaid is an experienced Electrical Engineer with over 10 years in electrical design, project management, and installation, testing, and commissioning. He has a proven track record of leading complex projects and managing multiple stakeholders effectively, demonstrating strong technical expertise in the electrical engineering domain.

employment_history.details: Senior Design & Application Engineer at Intech Process Automation, responsible for leading electrical systems E-house projects and managing installation, testing, and commissioning.
Senior Deputy Manager at Frontier Works Organization, overseeing project management and vendor coordination for various electrical projects.
Project Engineer at National Refinery Limited, involved in the design, procurement, installation, and commissioning of electrical systems.
Trainee Engineer at Lucky Cement Limited, focused on switchgear protection relay testing and power cables testing.
